info.title: meCash API
info.description:
API for meCash services, including FIAT and Ramp operations. This is the OpenAPI specification for the meCash API, covering all available endpoints for wallet management, currency quotes, and payouts.

It follows a design-first approach based on OpenAPI 3.0.

Authentication is handled via an API key passed in the `x-api-key` header. Replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual key when making requests.

Some useful links:
- [meCash Documentation](https://docs.me-cash.com/)
- [Authentication Guide](https://docs.me-cash.com/authentication)

QuoteBadRequest.description: Bad Request. The request could not be processed due to a client error.

QuoteNotFound.description: Not Found. The quote with the specified ID was not found.

QuoteValidationError.description: Unauthorized. A required parameter may be missing.

WalletsSuccess.description: A list of wallets was successfully retrieved.

BadRequest.description: Bad Request. The server could not process the request due to a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid parameters).

StaticVAccountBadRequest.description: Bad Request. The provided BVN is not a valid 11-digit number.

DynamicVAccountBadRequest.description: Bad Request. Occurs if the request body is missing required fields or contains invalid data types.

BankListNotAvailable.description: Bad Request. A list of banks is not available for the specified country or currency.

example.message: Bank list not available for the specified country and currency

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The request requires a valid API key.

UnauthorizedError.description: Unauthorized. The provided API key is invalid or missing.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The provided API key does not have permission to perform this request.

ForbiddenError.description: Forbidden. The request is not allowed, e.g., the source IP is not whitelisted.

NotFound.description: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found.

NotFoundError.description: Not Found. The requested resource, like a specific wallet, could not be found.

TransactionNotFoundOrInvalid.description: Not Found. The transaction ID could not be found or the parameter is invalid.

EnquiryAccountNotFound.description: Not Found. The specified bank account could not be found or resolved.

VAccountNotFound.description: Not Found. The virtual account with the specified ID was not found.

Conflict.description: Conflict. The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource, such as a duplicate reference.

DynamicVAccountConflict.description: Conflict. Occurs if the reference has already been used in a previous request.

UnprocessableEntity.description: Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

RampInvalidAddress.description: Unprocessable Entity. The address format is invalid for the specified blockchain.

example.message: Invalid address format for the specified blockchain

EnquiryValidationFailed.description: Unprocessable Entity. The account details are invalid.

TooManyRequests.description: Too Many Requests. You have hit the rate limit. Please try again later.

InternalServerError.description: Internal Server Error. We had a problem with our server. Try again later.

ServiceUnavailable.description: Service Unavailable. The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

PayoutUnauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The provided API key is invalid or missing.

PayoutForbidden.description: Forbidden. The request is not allowed because the source IP is not whitelisted.

example.message: Access denied: IP address not whitelisted

PayoutBadRequest.description: Bad Request. The request could not be processed due to a client-side error, such as an expired quote or insufficient funds.

PayoutInternalServerError.description: Internal Server Error. The server failed to process the request.

RampInvalidBlockchain.description: Bad Request. The provided blockchain network is not supported.
